creator: Inyad Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Inyad Store makes running your business a breeze. Turn your smartphone or tablet into a mobile Point of sale, start selling offline and online on Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, and Google. Take orders and accept payments. Organize inventory and manage your team. Grow your customer base. All at the tips of your fingers.

▶︎ Why you should use Inyad Store to manage your store?

• Set up your store in 10 seconds
• Sell online & Offline from any device
• Intuitive and easy to use without training
• 100% secure with automated data backup

▶︎ Main features of Inyad Store:

Mobile Point of sale system: inyad Store is the free point-of-sale app for Android that enables you to sell anywhere

Offline & Online: Our point of sale works both with and without Internet, If the internet goes off, Inyad Store will back up automatically all your sales when the system goes back online.

Quick checkout: Order in just 3 clicks! Select the products, the method of payment, and get ready to cash in!

Payment management: manage multiple payment options, split payments, refund past sales completely or partially, allow deposits and advances on sales, while tracking customers balances and collecting the rest…

Online Store: Sell your products from anywhere and no matter where your customers are, get your free online store in seconds, build your Online Product Catalog and get discovered easily to increase your sales.

Catalog management: Create your items, keep control of your prices and change them any time you want (according to different periods, new collection, sales...etc.)

Customer management: Engage with customers before, during and after a sale is made through you online store, Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp or SMS. Create customer profiles, keep tabs on purchase habits and connect with them online and offline.

Bookkeeping with Konnash : Record your customers' debts and payments, simplify follow-up and speed up collection.

Inventory management: Inyad Store is the best app for small businesses to keep a permanent visibility of their stock. So, if you are looking for an inventory app or a retail inventory system for your small store, Inyad store is the right app for you.

Sales reporting: See where you are making the most sales, view your sales history and identify your
strengths and areas of improvement with product or category sales details by product or category.

▶︎ What are you waiting for? Grow your small business in 4 steps Now!

1. Sign up with your phone number and enter your store’s name and address.
2. Add your products and items in a simple way.
3. Share your online store’s link with your customers.
4. Sell from home or from your store, only using your phone or tablet

▶︎ Who can use the Inyad Store app?

Whether you sell from home or manage multiple stores, inyad Store is the ideal solution you need to grow your business. You can use inyad Store if you are:

• Restaurant, fast food, coffee shop
• Bakery
• Beauty center, hair salon, barbershop, spa
• Electronics
• Apparel, Clothing
• Jewelry, makeup
• furniture stores
• Gift store
• Home decor
• Pet stores
• Sporting goods
• Toy store
• Grocery store
• Fruits and vegetables store
• Book Store
• Pharmacy and Medical store
• Craft or household items
• Home and repair services
• Freelancer

Download the application now and join the new small business revolution with millions of other merchants.

Follow us on our Facebook page to learn more about the features of Inyad Store and manage your sales better: www.facebook.com/inyadapss

For more informations about inyad merchant apps, you can visit : www.inyad.com
For more informations about konnash, you can visit : www.konnash.app

title: Mahaal ⎮ Point of Sale - POS

creator: inyad Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Whether you're a small retail shop, a large restaurant, or any other type of business, Mahaal point of sale POS system is the perfect solution for all your point-of-sale needs.
Use Mahaal POS point of sale system to record your daily sales, manage your inventory, create your online store, monitor suppliers and customers transactions, manage users permissions and roles, create purchase orders, invoices and much more all in one place.

Mobile POS System, use it on your smartphone or tablet to :
- Add unlimited products to the catalog
- Record your daily sales and track your margins and profit
- Create and publish your online store in seconds
- Manage your inventory
- Manage your customers and suppliers
- Create purchase orders & invoices
- Manage staff and employees and their access roles
- Set up your cash register
- Use for multi locations and multi stores
- Download PDF reports & statistics
- Sell online & offline from any smartphone or tablet
- Intuitive and easy to use without training
- 100% secure with automated data backup

Key Features of Mahaal POS :
Mobile Point of Sale system: Mahaal is a point-of-sale app for Android that enables you to sell anywhere using your smartphone or tablet

Offline & Online: Mahaal point of sale works both with and without Internet. If the internet goes off, Mahaal will back up automatically all your sales when the system goes back online.

Easy and fast checkout: Process sales in just 3 clicks! Select the products, activate your payment modes, and get ready to cash in!

Payment management: Manage multiple payment options with Mahaal POS, split payments, refund past sales completely or partially, allow deposits and advances on sales, while tracking customers balances and collecting credits…

Online Store: Sell your products from anywhere and no matter where your customers are, set up your e-commerce website, build your Online Product Catalog, enable online orders and get discovered easily.

Catalog management: Add unlimited items to your catalog, set up your prices and change them over time as needed.

Customer & Supplier management: Engage with customers before, during and after a sale is made through your online store, WhatsApp or SMS. Create customer & supplier profiles, keep tabs on purchase habits and connect with them online and offline.

Bookkeeping with Konnash : Record your customers and suppliers’ debts and payments, simplify follow-up and speed up collection.

Inventory management: Mahaal is the best POS app for small businesses to keep a permanent visibility of their stock. If you are looking for an inventory app or a retail inventory system for your small store, Mahaal is the right app for you.

Margin Calculator : Calculate your profit margin with Mahaal point of sale, learn how to determine the selling price and increase your profit

Reports and statistics : See where you are making the most sales, view your sales history, your inventory movements and identify your strengths and areas of improvement .

Purchase Orders : Generate purchase orders, track delivery with suppliers and automatically update your inventory once you receive your orders!

Who can use the Mahaal Point of Sale?
Whether you sell from home or manage multiple stores, Mahaal point of sale is the ideal solution you need to grow your business. You can use Mahaal if you are:

- Restaurant, Fast food, Coffee shop, Bakery, Beauty center, Hair salon, Barbershop, Spa, Electronics, Apparel, Clothing, Jewelry, Makeup , Furniture stores, Gift store, Home decor, Pet stores, Sporting goods, Toys store, Grocery store, Fruits and vegetables store, Pharmacy and Medical store, Home and repair services...

Download the application now and join the new small business revolution with millions of merchants.

Whether you're a small retail shop, a large restaurant, or any other type of business, Mahaal point of sale POS system is the perfect solution for all your point-of-sale needs.
Use Mahaal POS point of sale system to record your daily sales, manage your inventory, create your online store, monitor suppliers and customers transactions, manage users permissions and roles, create purchase orders, invoices and much more all in one place.

Mobile POS System, use it on your smartphone or tablet to :
- Add unlimited products to the catalog
- Record your daily sales and track your margins and profit
- Create and publish your online store in seconds
- Manage your inventory
- Manage your customers and suppliers
- Create purchase orders & invoices
- Manage staff and employees and their access roles
- Set up your cash register
- Use for multi locations and multi stores
- Download PDF reports & statistics
- Sell online & offline from any smartphone or tablet
- Intuitive and easy to use without training
- 100% secure with automated data backup

Key Features of Mahaal POS :
Mobile Point of Sale system: Mahaal is a point-of-sale app for Android that enables you to sell anywhere using your smartphone or tablet

Offline & Online: Mahaal point of sale works both with and without Internet. If the internet goes off, Mahaal will back up automatically all your sales when the system goes back online.

Easy and fast checkout: Process sales in just 3 clicks! Select the products, activate your payment modes, and get ready to cash in!

Payment management: Manage multiple payment options with Mahaal POS, split payments, refund past sales completely or partially, allow deposits and advances on sales, while tracking customers balances and collecting credits…

Online Store: Sell your products from anywhere and no matter where your customers are, set up your e-commerce website, build your Online Product Catalog, enable online orders and get discovered easily.

Catalog management: Add unlimited items to your catalog, set up your prices and change them over time as needed.

Customer & Supplier management: Engage with customers before, during and after a sale is made through your online store, WhatsApp or SMS. Create customer & supplier profiles, keep tabs on purchase habits and connect with them online and offline.

Bookkeeping with Konnash : Record your customers and suppliers’ debts and payments, simplify follow-up and speed up collection.

Inventory management: Mahaal is the best POS app for small businesses to keep a permanent visibility of their stock. If you are looking for an inventory app or a retail inventory system for your small store, Mahaal is the right app for you.

Margin Calculator : Calculate your profit margin with Mahaal point of sale, learn how to determine the selling price and increase your profit

Reports and statistics : See where you are making the most sales, view your sales history, your inventory movements and identify your strengths and areas of improvement .

Purchase Orders : Generate purchase orders, track delivery with suppliers and automatically update your inventory once you receive your orders!

Who can use the Mahaal Point of Sale?
Whether you sell from home or manage multiple stores, Mahaal point of sale is the ideal solution you need to grow your business. You can use Mahaal if you are:

- Restaurant, Fast food, Coffee shop, Bakery, Beauty center, Hair salon, Barbershop, Spa, Electronics, Apparel, Clothing, Jewelry, Makeup , Furniture stores, Gift store, Home decor, Pet stores, Sporting goods, Toys store, Grocery store, Fruits and vegetables store, Pharmacy and Medical store, Home and repair services...

Download the application now and join the new small business revolution with millions of merchants.
For more information about Mahaal POS : www.mahaal.app
For more information about inyad merchant apps : www.inyad.com
For more information about Konnash : www.konnash.app
For more information about Takam : www.takam.app

descriptionShort: Turn your smartphone or tablet into a mobile Point of Sale (POS)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New version, with lots of cool improvements

title:
Mahaal Point of Sale POS
1.12.2-prod

creator: inyad Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Mahaal Point of Sale is a point-of-sale app that enables you to sell anywhere and in any way, your customers prefer.
Payments, catalog, inventory, analytics, eCommerce, and CRM— are all integrated with your point of sale.

Elevate your business with Mahaal, the all-in-one Point of Sale (POS) system designed for retail shops, restaurants, beauty salons, and more.

Mahaal is available on Android (Mobile & Tablet) and Web providing you with the flexibility to manage your business from any device, anywhere, and at any time.

**Checkout**

Process sales effortlessly with just a few clicks, ensuring smooth and hassle-free transactions. Customize your catalog, handle add-ons, special requests, and modifiers easily. Access frequently used items, discounts, and categories swiftly to keep your customers satisfied. Refund specific items when needed, providing top-notch customer service.

**Invoices**

Create professional-looking estimates. Easily convert them into invoices. Customize and share PDF invoices via email or WhatsApp, including secure payment links for prompt online payments.

**Payments**

Accept cash, credit card, and touch-free payments through QR codes, catering to your customers' preferences. Seamlessly send custom invoices directly from your POS system.

**Other Features**

- **Inventory Management:** Keep track of stock levels, receive low stock alerts, and effortlessly manage your inventory. Sync your inventory across checkout, invoices, online store, and purchase orders for real-time updates.
- **Purchase Orders:** Generate and manage purchase orders, track deliveries, and seamlessly update inventory upon receipt.
- **eCommerce:** Effortlessly set up your online store without technical expertise. Add unlimited products and pictures, consolidate orders from popular platforms, and track sales seamlessly from order to payment. Make your online store conveniently accessible through a QR code.
- **Loyalty Rewards:** With Mahaal, your customers can earn points with every purchase, and redeem them for freebies and reductions at your store.

Mahaal is available on Android (Mobile & Tablet) and Web providing you with the flexibility to manage your business from any device, anywhere, and at any time.

**Checkout**

Process sales effortlessly with just a few clicks, ensuring smooth and hassle-free transactions. Customize your catalog, handle add-ons, special requests, and modifiers easily. Access frequently used items, discounts, and categories swiftly to keep your customers satisfied. Refund specific items when needed, providing top-notch customer service.

**Invoices**

Create professional-looking estimates. Easily convert them into invoices. Customize and share PDF invoices via email or WhatsApp, including secure payment links for prompt online payments.

**Payments**

Accept cash, credit card, and touch-free payments through QR codes, catering to your customers' preferences. Seamlessly send custom invoices directly from your POS system.

**Other Features**

- **Inventory Management:** Keep track of stock levels, receive low stock alerts, and effortlessly manage your inventory. Sync your inventory across checkout, invoices, online store, and purchase orders for real-time updates.
